ComicInfo.Title: Meg 17
ComicInfo.Summary:
Final part of Dredd epic - Raptaur.
Cover: Dean Ormston (Judge Dredd)
Judge Dredd - Raptaur (part 7 - final part) (Alan Grant - Dean Ormston) Judge Dredd - Drokk of Ages (Sega Game Gear page comic strip advert) (art: Dermot Power) The Straightjacket Fits (part 12) (David Bishop - Roger Langridge) Brit-Cit Babes (part 2) (John Wagner - Steve Sampson) Middenface McNulty - Wan Man an' Hus Dug (part 3) (Alan Grant and Tony Luke - John McCrea) Judge Edwina's Strange Cases - Skin Games (John Smith - John Hicklenton) Heavy Metal Dredd - Chicken Run (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Simon Bisley)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-13 22:02:00. [Issue ID 146796]
ComicInfo.Teams: Brit-Cit Babes,Strontium Dogs,Judges of Mega-City One
ComicInfo.Writer: Alan Grant,David Bishop,John Smith,John Wagner,Tony Luke
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dean Ormston,Dermot Power,John McCrea,Johnny Hicklenton,Roger Langridge,Simon Bisley,Steve Sampson
ComicInfo.Inker: Dean Ormston,Dermot Power,John McCrea,Johnny Hicklenton,Roger Langridge,Simon Bisley,Steve Sampson
